content:
/>
VIII.iv.3.C.5.d
.
Development for Employment and VR&E Information During a Supplemental IU Claim
Develop for
VA Form 21-4192, Request for Employment Information in Connection With Claim for Disability Benefits
,
or SSA or VR&E records during a supplemental claim when
development for this evidence was not completed, as directed in
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 3.B.4
, with a prior initial or supplemental claim, or
new information concerning the Veteran’s employment, VR&E, or SSA status is received on
VA Form 21-8940
or other submitted evidence and requires further verification
.
References
:  For more information on development for
VA Form 21-4192
, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 3.B.3.a-c
SSA records, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 3.B.4.a
, and
VR&E records, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 3.B.4.b
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C - Individual Unemployability (IU) Rating and Decision Review
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C
